title: Can i serve jail time for traffic tickets gone to collection.
question: I didnt pay the fines on time so the court sent my tickets debts to a collection agency. I cant even make payments because i dont have a job.
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Criminal defense,Misdemeanor crime,Criminal arrest,Criminal fines,Court-ordered community service for criminal conviction,Warrants and criminal charges,Traffic tickets,Traffic fines
answers: If there are warrants out for your arrest, you can serve time if the police stop you and take you in to see the judge. You will not get any additional time, as long as the traffic tickets are infractions. If they are misdemeanors, that could be a different story. You should hire an attorney to go to court immediately to resolve the warrants/failure to appears. The judge might even let you convert the fines to community service, since you cannot pay.
